pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows XP/Vista/Windows 7/8/8.1/10 (32bit/64BIT)
  • Processor: 1.6 GHz
  • Graphics: intel Graphics
  • Sound Card: DirectX 9.0 Compatible Sound
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows XP/Vista/Windows 7/8/8.1/10 (32bit/64BIT)
  • Processor: 1.6 GHz+
  • Graphics: NIVIDIA OR AMD
  • Sound Card: DirectX 9.0 Compatible Sound +
